title: The Moonlight Forest Friends
hook: Join Lily the Bunny as she solves a mystery in the Moonlight Forest! What will she discover?
moral: Friendship and cooperation can help solve problems and mysteries together.
paragraphs: Once upon a time, in the enchanting Moonlight Forest, lived Lily the Bunny and her friends, Henry the Squirrel and Mia the Hedgehog.
One sunny day, they discovered that their friend, Sam the Owl, had lost his favorite shiny feather. Sam was very sad and couldn't sleep without it.
Lily suggested, "Let's search together! The forest is big, but with teamwork, we can find it quicker." Henry and Mia agreed, hopping and scurrying around to look.

As the friends searched high and low, Mia spotted something shiny near a tall oak tree. It was Sam's lost feather caught in the branches! The friends cheered and returned the feather to a grateful Sam.
Sam thanked Lily, Henry, and Mia for their help, realizing that together, they could solve any problem that came their way.

id-en.hook: Join Lily the Bunny as she solves a mystery in the Moonlight Forest! What will she discover?
id-en.moral: Friendship and cooperation can help solve problems and mysteries together.
id-en.title: The Moonlight Forest Friends
paragraphs:
A long time ago, in a magical forest filled with moonlight, there was a bunny named Lily and her buddies, Henry the squirrel and Mia the hedgehog.
One bright day, they found out that their pal, Sam the Owl, had misplaced his shiny fluffy feather. Sam felt really sad and couldn't snooze without it.
Lily had an idea, "Let's look for it together! The forest is very big, but if we help each other, we can find it faster." Henry and Mia said yes, and began jumping and running to search.
When the friends looked everywhere, Mia saw something super shiny next to a really tall tree. It was Sam's missing feather stuck high! The friends were so happy and gave back the feather to a thankful Sam.
Sam said thank you to Lily, Henry, and Mia for helping him. He knew that when they work together, they can fix any problem that comes.

en-fr.title: Les Amis de la Forêt de Clair de Lune
en-fr.moral: L'amitié et la coopération peuvent aider à résoudre les problèmes et les mystères ensemble.
en-fr.hook: Viens rejoindre Lily le Lapin qui résout un mystère dans la Forêt de Lune ! Quelle découverte va-t-elle faire ?
paragraphs:
Il était une fois, dans la forêt enchantée de la Lune, habitait Lily le Lapin et ses amis, Henry l'Ecureuil et Mia le Hérisson.
Il était une fois, par une journée ensoleillée, ils ont découvert que leur ami, Sam le Hibou, avait perdu sa plume brillante préférée. Sam était très triste et ne pouvait pas dormir sans elle.
Lily a proposé, "Cherchons ensemble! La forêt est grande, mais avec l'équipe, nous pouvons le trouver plus rapidement." Henry et Mia étaient d'accord, sautant et se dépêchant pour chercher.
Alors que les amis cherchaient partout, Mia a vu quelque chose de brillant près d'un grand chêne. C'était la plume perdue de Sam coincée dans les branches ! Les amis ont applaudi et ont rendu la plume à un Sam reconnaissant.
Sam a dit merci à Lily, Henry et Mia pour leur aide, en réalisant qu'ensemble, ils pourraient résoudre n'importe quel problème qui se présentait devant eux.

en-de.title: Die Freunde des Mondlichtwaldes
en-de.moral: Freundschaft und Zusammenarbeit können helfen, Probleme und Geheimnisse gemeinsam zu lösen.
en-de.hook: Komm mit Lilli dem Häschen, wenn sie ein Rätsel im Mondscheinwald löst! Was wird sie entdecken?
paragraphs:
Es war einmal, in dem zauberhaften Mondlichtwald, lebten Lily das Häschen und ihre Freunde, Henry das Eichhörnchen und Mia der Igel.
An einem sonnigen Tag entdeckten sie, dass ihr Freund, Sam the Owl, seine Lieblingsglanzfeder verloren hatte. Sam war sehr traurig und konnte nicht ohne sie schlafen.
Lily schlug vor: "Lass uns zusammen suchen! Der Wald ist groß, aber mit Teamarbeit können wir es schneller finden." Henry und Mia stimmten zu, hüpften herum und huschten, um zu suchen.
Als die Freunde hoch und niedrig suchten, entdeckte Mia etwas Glänzendes in der Nähe eines hohen Eichenbaums. Es war Sams verlorene Feder, die in den Ästen hängen blieb! Die Freunde jubelten und gaben die Feder einem dankbaren Sam zurück.
Sam bedankte sich bei Lily, Henry und Mia für ihre Hilfe. Er merkte, dass sie zusammen jedes Problem lösen könnten, das auf sie zukam.

en-pt.moral: Amizade e colaboração podem ajudar a resolver problemas e mistérios juntos.
en-pt.hook: Acompanhe Lilica, a Coelhinha, enquanto ela resolve um mistério na Floresta do Luar! O que será que ela vai descobrir?
en-pt.title: Amigos da Floresta da Luz da Lua
paragraphs:
Era uma vez, na encantadora Floresta da Lua, vivia a Lilica Coelhinha e seus amigos, Henrique o Esquilo e Mimi a Ouriça.
Certa vez, num lindo dia de sol, eles descobriram que o amigo deles, Sam a Coruja, tinha perdido sua pena brilhante favorita. Sam ficou muito triste e não conseguia dormir sem ela.
Lily sugeriu, "Vamos procurar juntos! A floresta é grande, mas com trabalho em equipe, podemos achar mais rápido." Henry e Mia concordaram, pulando e se movendo ao redor para procurar.
Enquanto os amigos procuravam pra cima e pra baixo, Mia viu algo brilhante perto de uma árvore alta de carvalho. Era a peninha perdida de Sam presa nos galhos! Os amigos vibraram e devolveram a peninha para um Sam agradecido. 
Sam agradeceu Lily, Henry e Mia pela ajuda, percebendo que juntos, eles poderiam resolver qualquer problema que surgisse.
